title: The year is 2007 summer break just started, I just got an Xbox 360 halo edition with halo 3 as payment for baby sitting.

author: dregwriter
text:
Xbox live during those days was the wild west. Completely lawless. Dudes was just saying any and everything. You couldnt be soft hearted and thinned skin while playing on live.

Never been called the N word so many times in my life, which was none until that point.

and I still miss it, lolololol

author: KylosDeadDadd
text: Someone sent me a picture of their asshole using the 360 webcam because they lost a team doubles match. The good ol days

author: pathofdumbasses
text: I'm not even mad, that's amazing

author: the_fuego
text:
As an adult you realize that they were just immature assholes, probably losers but there have been plenty of times where the day just lines up to be awful enough where you want to berate your team or enemy but can't because either nobody is in public chat or you'll get a ban. Halo 3 and MW2 were absolute cesspools that would have been locked down so quick in today's gaming era.

Those fuckers NEVER got banned either unless they were sending porn. So fuckin wild lmao.

author: BilllisCool
text: In Halo 3, I loved to whack my teammates until they got mad enough to kill me. Then if I got the boot message, I would leave it on my screen and keep trash talking. There was a trick to keep walking around with the boot message up, so they would never guess I had the ability to boot them from the game at any moment. Then at the perfect moment, when the trash talk lined up just right, I would boot them. Then await the message from them. Bonus if it was voice message. I miss this so much.

author: dregwriter
text:
I definitely did my fair share of shit talking during those days, so i cant even front.

I remember playing phantasy star universe and was talking mad shit, teasing and making fun of a guy who could not accept the fact that the girl in the voice chat with me was white and she was dating, me, a black guy. Dude was SO MAD and spewing all kinds of racist shit. lol.

We in the party chat clowning this cat. man, those days was something else bruh, lol

text: Maybe the world needs this again. It’s time to bring back Xbox live lobby’s
